Epilepsy
If you have epilepsy, talk to 
your doctor before you try to 
get pregnant. Pre-pregnancy 
clinics for women with epilepsy 
are available to help you get 
ready for pregnancy.
Postnatal depression and 
postpartum psychosis
If you have previously 
experienced postnatal 
depression or postpartum 
psychosis, talk to your doctor 
before you try to get pregnant.
Sexually transmitted 
infections	(STIs)
STIs	can	affect	your	health	
and your ability to conceive.
